exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="footTileGroup" width="832" height="832" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect height="832" width="832" fillColor="0x000000"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="bulletGroup" width="832" height="832" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="tankGroup" width="832" height="832" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="topTileGroup" height="832" width="832" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="itemGroup" width="832" height="832" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="boomGroup" width="832" height="832" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="enemyNumGroup" height="390" width="140" x="1394" y="100">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="playerLifeGroup" x="1374" width="140" y="530" height="390">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1Label" x="20" y="50" font="blackFont_fnt" text="1P"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1LifeLabel" y="90" text="2" font="blackFont_fnt" x="67"/>
		<e:Image id="p1Icon" source="game_playerLife_png" x="26" y="90"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p2Label" y="150" text="2P" font="blackFont_fnt" x="20"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p2LifeLabel" y="190" text="2" font="blackFont_fnt" x="67"/>
		<e:Image id="p2Icon" source="game_playerLife_png" y="190" x="26"/>
		<e:Image source="game_stageImg_png" x="23" y="274"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="stageLabel" x="98" y="300" font="blackFont_fnt" text="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="topGroup" horizontalCenter="0" width="832" verticalCenter="0" height="832" x="10" y="10">
		<e:Image id="gameOverIcon" source="base_gameover_png" y="766" x="354"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="waveLabel" x="1390" y="102" font="yellowFont_fnt" text="WAVE.7"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ScoreLabelSkin" width="70" height="70" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:BitmapLabel id="scoreLabel" font="writeFont_fnt" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" text="999"/>
</e:Skin>

<e:Skin class="CampSkin" width="64" height="64" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="normal" source="base_png" x="0" y="4"/>
	<e:Image id="destoryImg" source="base_destory_png" x="2" y="5"/>
</e:Skin>

	<e:Image source="tile1_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<e:Skin class="RiverSkin" width="64" height="64" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">

	<e:BitmapLabel id="stageLabel" x="140" font="writeFont_fnt" text="-  S3" y="19"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="waveLabel" text="WAVE.5" x="230" font="redFont_fnt" y="19"/>
</e:Skin>

	<e:BitmapLabel id="killLabel" x="221" y="21" font="writeFont_fnt" text="X  36"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="title" source="home_title_png" y="136" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="codeGroup" height="280" width="280" x="700" y="478">
		<e:Image id="codeBg" source="home_code_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="250" width="348" x="1020" y="448">
		<e:Image id="p1" source="home_p1_png" x="92" y="59" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="26" anchorOffsetY="32" rotation="90" width="52" height="64"/>
		<e:Image id="p2" source="home_p2_png" x="92" y="169" anchorOffsetX="26" anchorOffsetY="32" rotation="90" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="home__png" x="178" y="60"/>
		<e:Image source="home__png" y="170" x="178"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI id="p1HeadUI" x="240" y="30" skinName="HeadUISkin" width="60" height="60"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI id="p2HeadUI" y="140" skinName="HeadUISkin" x="240" width="60" height="60"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="countDownGroup" height="146" width="190" x="1088" y="674">
		<e:BitmapLabel id="countDownLabel" font="countDownFont_fnt" text="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="rankGroup" height="500" width="500" x="118" y="326">
		<e:BitmapLabel x="28" y="134" font="writeFont_fnt" text="1"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="207" text="2" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="279" text="3" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="352" text="4" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="424" text="5" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:Rect height="350" width="2" x="68" y="133" fillColor="0xFEFCFC"/>
		<e:Rect width="450" y="482" height="2" fillColor="0xFEFCFC" x="26"/>
		<e:Image source="home_ranktext_png" x="34" y="78" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:RankHeadUI id="rankHead0" x="85" y="117" skinName="RankHeadSkin"/>
		<ns1:RankHeadUI x="85" y="189" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead1"/>
		<ns1:RankHeadUI id="rankHead2" y="261" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="85"/>
		<ns1:RankHeadUI x="85" y="332" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rankHead3"/>
		<ns1:RankHeadUI id="rankHead4" y="404" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="85"/>
		<e:Image source="home_weektext_png" x="40" y="496"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="killGroup" y="326" width="500" height="500" x="1378">
		<e:BitmapLabel y="134" text="1" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="207" text="2" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="279" text="3" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="352" text="4" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="424" text="5" font="writeFont_fnt" x="28"/>
		<e:Rect width="2" y="133" height="350" fillColor="0xFEFCFC" x="68"/>
		<e:Rect width="450" y="482" height="2" fillColor="0xFEFCFC" x="26"/>
		<e:Image y="78" scaleY="1" x="34" scaleX="1" source="home_killtext_png"/>
		<ns1:KillHeadUI id="killHead0" x="92" y="114" skinName="KillHeadUISkin"/>
		<ns1:KillHeadUI x="92" y="186" skinName="KillHeadUISkin" id="killHead1"/>
		<ns1:KillHeadUI id="killHead2" y="259" skinName="KillHeadUISkin" x="92"/>
		<ns1:KillHeadUI x="92" y="331" skinName="KillHeadUISkin" id="killHead3"/>
		<ns1:KillHeadUI id="killHead4" y="403" skinName="KillHeadUISkin" x="92"/>
		<e:Image source="home_weektext_png" x="40" y="496"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:BitmapLabel y="44" text="I-                 00" font="writeFont_fnt" x="508"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="historyLabel" y="44" text="HI-          20000" font="writeFont_fnt" x="828" width="516"/>
	<e:Label text="©2017 GameDaybyDay" y="912" size="30" x="798"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="0%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="100" width="630" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image source="home_p1_png" x="724" y="456" rotation="90"/>
	<e:Image id="enemyTank" source="result_enemy1_png" x="1264" y="456" rotation="90"/>
	<e:Rect id="barBg" height="3" width="470" y="522" x="725" fillColor="0x333333"/>
	<e:Rect id="bar" width="470" y="522" height="3" x="725" anchorOffsetX="0" fillColor="0xFAF7F7"/>
	<e:Image id="bullet" source="bullet_png" x="762" y="464" rotation="90"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:BitmapLabel y="40" font="writeFont_fnt" text="HI-SCORE" x="756"/>

	<e:BitmapLabel y="630" text="TOTAL" font="writeFont_fnt" x="646"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="waveLabel" y="90" text="WAVE.5" x="966" font="yellowFont_fnt"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="historyLabel" y="40" text="99999" font="writeFont_fnt" x="1002" width="297"/>
	<e:Image y="246" x="934" source="result_enemy0_png"/>
	<e:Image y="331" x="934" source="result_enemy1_png"/>
	<e:Image source="result_enemy2_png" y="415" x="934"/>
	<e:Image source="result_enemy3_png" y="500" x="934"/>
	<e:Rect height="5" width="418" y="588" fillColor="0xFCFAFA" x="751"/>
	<e:Group id="rankGroup" height="320" width="850" x="524" y="670">
		<e:Rect id="rankBg" height="600" width="2400" y="0" fillColor="0x333A42" x="-760"/>

		<e:Label id="rankLabel" y="31" size="30" text="999" x="588" width="60" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0xF49129"/>
		<e:Label y="31" textColor="0xFAF9F6" size="30" text="名" x="654" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI id="p1RankHead" x="346" y="18" skinName="HeadUISkin" width="80" height="80"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI id="p2RankHead" y="14" skinName="HeadUISkin" x="456" width="80" height="80"/>

		<e:Label id="p1Kill1Label" y="141" textColor="0xFAF9F6" text="名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="30" x="654"/>
		<e:Label id="p2Kill0Label" y="222" textColor="0xFAF9F6" text="第" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="30" x="550"/>
		<e:Label id="p2KillLabel" y="221" textColor="0xF60717" text="999" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="60" verticalAlign="middle" size="30" x="588"/>
		<e:Label id="p2Kill1Label" y="221" textColor="0xFAF9F6" text="名" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="30" x="654"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI id="p1KillHead" y="123" x="346" width="80" skinName="HeadUISkin" height="80"/>
		<ns1:HeadUI id="p2KillHead" y="208" x="346" width="80" skinName="HeadUISkin" height="80"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="p1ScoreGroup" height="422" width="364" x="550" y="148">
		<e:BitmapLabel y="20" text="1 PLAYER" font="writeFont_fnt" x="26"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel y="120" text="PTS" font="writeFont_fnt" x="144"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1Tank0Label" y="120" text="999" font="writeFont_fnt" x="234"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1Tank1Label" x="234" y="203" text="999" font="writeFont_fnt"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1Tank2Label" y="285" text="999" font="writeFont_fnt" x="234"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1Tank3Label" x="234" y="368" text="999" font="writeFont_fnt"/>

		<e:BitmapLabel y="368" text="PTS" font="writeFont_fnt" x="144"/>

		<e:Image source="result_arrow_png" x="312" y="116"/>
		<e:Image source="result_arrow_png" y="199" x="312"/>
		<e:Image source="result_arrow_png" y="281" x="312"/>
		<e:Image source="result_arrow_png" y="364" x="312"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="p1TotalLabel" y="482" text="99" x="247" font="redFont_fnt"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="p2ScoreGroup" height="436" width="406" x="994" y="140">

		<e:BitmapLabel y="29" text="2 PLAYER" font="writeFont_fnt" x="166"/>
		<e:Image source="result_arrow_png" y="153" x="54" rotation="180"/>

		<e:BitmapLabel y="125" text="PTS" font="writeFont_fnt" x="168"/>

		<e:BitmapLabel y="373" text="PTS" font="writeFont_fnt" x="168"/>

	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TransitionSceneSkin" width="1920" height="1024" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1024" width="1920" fillColor="0x777777"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="stageLabel" font="blackFont_fnt" text="STAGE 3" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="endLessGroup" height="200" width="1142" y="542" x="399">
		<e:Label text="小心了！无尽关卡将会有" x="5" y="36" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x030000"/>
		<e:Label y="36" textColor="0x030000" text="的敌军" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="473"/>
		<e:Label y="36" textColor="0x030000" text="攻打过来，挑战你的生存能力！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="695"/>
		<e:Label y="36" text="源源不断" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="345" textColor="0xF50606"/>
		<e:Label y="36" textColor="0xF50606" text="一波一波" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="565"/>
		<e:Label y="-54" text="无尽模式" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="715" size="50" textColor="0xDA2935"/>
		<e:Label y="-57" text="-" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="50" x="665" textColor="0x040000"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
